title: Matchmaking and Queue Times Twisted Treeline
body:
Hello everybody,
Is anybody else experiencing 20 min and more queue times in 3 vs 3 ?
I happen to queue up for atleast 10 mins every time, no matter when i play, even on saturday evening...
Not only have I immense queue times but also the matchmaking is kinda kidding me.
I play with players who are summoner level 29 against players who are silver or gold in 3vs 3.
Is riots idea that I ( I am master in 3 vs 3 ) can carry 2 guys who are lvl 29 and are like 0-10-0 after 5 mins ?
This is totally retarded, it is no fun for my teammates at all and for me neither as I basically play 1 vs 3.
I understand that rather few players play Twisted Treeline but come on, we have to wait 20 mins for a normal game and then either get stomped or stomp the enemy and finish the game after 15 mins.
However, can anybody give me an explanation why I have such immense queue times in 3vs 3 ?

replies.body: so the lvl 29 player with around 50 games in 3 vs 3 has the same mmr i have ?
MMR should be the answer for both of ur questions
